cancelConfirmation.text: Do you really want to cancel this event?

notAllowed.title: Canceling classes is not possible
notAllowed.text: You can not change the schedule at this moment. You are allowed to modify schedule between {{startTime}} and {{endTime}}.

alert.schedulingTimeFrame: You are allowed to modify schedule between {{startTime}} and {{endTime}} ({{subdepartment}})

timetable.fetchError: Unexpected error while fetching schedule from server!

timetable.deleted: A Class Unit successfully removed from timetable

error.timeFrameError: You are not allowed to modify schedule now for selected department (due to scheduling time frames)
error.semesterEnded: Cannot add schedule unit with start date after semester end date!
error.semesterNotStart: Cannot add schedule unit with start date before semester start date!
error.bookingConflict: Cannot add booking at the selected time (conflict found)
error.scheduleConflict: Cannot add class to schedule at the selected time
error.requiredQuantityNotSatisfied: The required number of classes cannot be added before the end of the semester
